LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipToxicSensitivity: Set the toxic sensitivity for this animal Toxic sensitivity adjusts how strongly a creature is affected by toxic buildup, a value of 0 results in immunity
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMinToxicSensitivity: Set a minimum toxic sensitivity for all animals
LanguageData.SY_CA.TooltipMaxToxicSensitivity: Set a maximum toxic sensitivity for all animals
